languages.text:
"Грядет! Грядет!
Все ближе и ближе!
Внемлите слову Зари! Забудьте о всех каждодневных делах. Амбиции — пыль, желания — ржавчина на металле души.
Грядет Последний восход! Он закончит все тщетное!"

"It's coming! It's coming!
It's drawing ever nearer!
Heed the word of Aurora! Abandon all your mundane affairs. Ambition is but dust. Desire is but rust upon the metal of the soul.
The Final Dawn is coming! It will put an end to all worldly vanities!"
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
"Sie kommt! Sie kommt!
Sie nähert sich unaufhörlich!
Hört auf Auroras Wort! Gebt all Eure weltlichen Angelegenheiten auf. Ehrgeiz ist nur Staub. Verlangen ist nur Rost auf dem Metall der Seele.
Die Letzte Dämmerung kommt! Sie wird aller weltlichen Eitelkeit ein Ende bereiten!"
languages.original_text:
"It's coming! It's coming!
It's drawing ever nearer!
Heed the word of Aurora! Abandon all your mundane affairs. Ambition is but dust. Desire is but rust upon the metal of the soul.
The Final Dawn is coming! It will put an end to all worldly vanities!"

languages.text:
« Elle arrive ! Elle arrive !
Elle se rapproche toujours plus !
Entendez la parole d'Aurore ! Abandonnez toutes vos affaires bassement matérielles. L'ambition n'est que poussière. Le désir n'est que rouille sur le métal de l'âme.
L'Aube finale arrive ! Elle mettra un terme à toutes les vanités terrestres ! »
languages.original_text:
"It's coming! It's coming!
It's drawing ever nearer!
Heed the word of Aurora! Abandon all your mundane affairs. Ambition is but dust. Desire is but rust upon the metal of the soul.
The Final Dawn is coming! It will put an end to all worldly vanities!"

traits.locale_text:

L'Aube finale arrive ! Elle mettra un terme à toutes les vanités terrestres ! »

languages.text:
“它来了！它来了！
它愈来愈近了！
聆听‘极光’的告诫吧！忘却世俗的事务吧。野心不过是尘土，欲望也不过是灵魂钢铁上的锈斑。
终末黎明即将降临！它将终结世上的一切浮华之物！”
languages.original_text:
"It's coming! It's coming!
It's drawing ever nearer!
Heed the word of Aurora! Abandon all your mundane affairs. Ambition is but dust. Desire is but rust upon the metal of the soul.
The Final Dawn is coming! It will put an end to all worldly vanities!"

traits.locale_text:
“它来了！它来了！
它愈来愈近了！
聆听‘极光’的告诫吧！忘却世俗的事务吧。野心不过是尘土，欲望也不过是灵魂钢铁上的锈斑。
终末黎明即将降临！它将终结世上的一切浮华之物！”

languages.text:
「来るぞ！来るぞ！
近づいている！
オーロラの言葉に従うのだ！ありふれた世俗的なことは、すべて捨て去りなさい。野心はただの塵だ。欲望は魂の金属についたさびに過ぎない。
最後の夜明けが来る！それは、すべての世俗的な空虚を終わらせるだろう！」
languages.original_text:
"It's coming! It's coming!
It's drawing ever nearer!
Heed the word of Aurora! Abandon all your mundane affairs. Ambition is but dust. Desire is but rust upon the metal of the soul.
The Final Dawn is coming! It will put an end to all worldly vanities!"

languages.text:
«¡Se acerca! ¡Se acerca!
¡Está cada vez más cerca!
¡Presta atención a la palabra de Aurora! Abandona todos tus asuntos cotidianos. La ambición no es más que polvo. El deseo no es más que óxido en el metal del alma.
¡El Amanecer Final se acerca! ¡Acabará con todas las vanidades terrenales!».
languages.original_text:
"It's coming! It's coming!
It's drawing ever nearer!
Heed the word of Aurora! Abandon all your mundane affairs. Ambition is but dust. Desire is but rust upon the metal of the soul.
The Final Dawn is coming! It will put an end to all worldly vanities!"

languages.text:
"Geliyor! Geliyor!
Gittikçe yaklaşıyor!
Aurora'nın sözlerine kulak verin! Tüm fuzuli işlerinizi bir yana koyun. Hırs gelip geçer. Arzu, ruhun metali üstündeki pastan ibarettir.
Nihai Şafak geliyor! Tüm fâni beyhudeliklere son verecek!"
languages.original_text:
"It's coming! It's coming!
It's drawing ever nearer!

The Final Dawn is coming! It will put an end to all worldly vanities!"
